entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:30 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
